items.sentence: Do you have a needle and thread that I could use to sew this button back on?
I've already told Tom that I plan on staying in Boston for three more weeks.
Drink this potion, and you'll be able to turn into whatever animal you want.
I ate some of the cake that my mother baked, even though she told me not to.
You should apologize to your father for not getting home in time for dinner.
